title: Free Stock Footage - California Agriculture Cornfield Aerial Drone Flyover 4k

subtasks: Sitting on the tractor seat.
Operating the tractor controls to turn it on.
Using the joystick to maneuver the tractor.
Pressing the clutch and accelerator pedals.
Adjusting the steering wheel or lever for direction.
Guiding the hay onto the baler.
Feeding the hay into the baler mechanism.
Manipulating the baling rope or strap.
Initiating the baling cycle.
Monitoring the bale size and ensuring evenness.
Disengaging the wheel loader铲斗.
Guiding the bale out of the baler.
Positioning the bale onto the wagon or trailer.
Sitting on the wagon seat or driving from the ground.
Guiding the wagon to the desired location.
Using the steering to navigate through fields.
Positioning the bale on the wagon.
Using straps or chains to secure the bale to the wagon.

tasks.task: Verifying that all equipment is safely stopped.
subtasks: Ensuring the tractor is in park or neutral.
Checking that the baler is disengaged from the tractor.
Making sure the wagon is secure and brakes are applied.
Disconnecting the electrical connections if applicable.
Rendering the entire setup ready for the next movement.

tasks.task: Driving a tractor with multiple attachments.
subtasks: Securing the baler to the tractor.
Connecting the electrical and hydraulic lines to the tractor.
Attaching the wheel loader or other implements as necessary.
Disengaging them when not in use.
Verifying all attachments are properly connected and disconnected.
